Oak_Lawn.99th Street\u2013Beverly Hills (Metra st:
99th Street Station (also known as 99th Street - Beverly Hills Station) is one of five Metra stations within the Beverly Hills neighborhood of Chicago, Illinois, along the Beverly Branch of the Rock Island District Line. The station is located at 9901 South Walden Parkway near 99th Street, 12.3 miles (19.8 km) from LaSalle Street, the northern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, 99th Street is in zone C.
Despite the name of the station, parking is not available along 99th Street.
